revision.text:
{{doomwiki}} An '''item''' is any [[inventory]] [[actor]] that can be picked up thanks to having the {{Flag|SPECIAL}} flag. Items with the {{Flag|COUNTITEM}} flag are tallied on the [[intermission]] screen.
Some items appear in the inventory bar and may be used when wanted, those are generally called "[[artifact]]s" or "inventory items". [[Category:Glossary]]
